name: StreetWriters
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to a weekly writing tip from the Street Writers podcast. Just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing" — and you're ready to take it to the streets and fight to write! (Say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.)

Street Writers is a once-a-week 10-minute, two-fisted take on getting you writing— powerfully, productively and with plenty of punch. Writing as a craft calls for tenacity, consistency and the courage to face an empty page. Mark Bellusci and Dan Chichester are pros at bare-knuckle writing for stage, film, editorial, marketing and comics. This Flash Briefing is a 1 minute edit drawn from the podcast's popular "Take A Swing At This" segment, which leads off every episode with a hard-earned technique to help you roll up your sleeves, beat down the demons, and move that project forward — be it a novel, ad, play, press release, game, screenplay or shopping list. 

Find full episodes of Street Writers everywhere podcasts are served up — or go directly to anchor.fm/streetwriters to browse episodes filled with writing inspiration, motivation and activation.

(This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.)
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
